title: Womens Dress
title_original: Women's Bolero Shrug 3/4 Sleeve Cropped Cardigan Knit Sweaters Open Front Casual Elegant Jacket for Dresses

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the shrug to be a great bolero with a lovely knitted design that's super soft and comfortable. They appreciate its lightweight nature, with one customer noting it's perfect for 55°F evenings, and they like how it fits, with one mentioning the sleeves are roomy. Customers disagree on the sizing, with several noting it runs small, and opinions on value for money are mixed, with some saying it's worth it

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and well made
items.body: Well made, closet essential. I bought a size XL and it fits exactly like I wanted it to. The arms are snug;not tight or uncomfortable but definitely not a loose fit. The yarn(?) Is soft and not scratchy. Since receiving this first shrug, I've purchased 2 more in other colors. Read more
items.author: Chavella

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Runs a little small
items.body: This was so beautiful, but a medium does not fit. I wear a size 6 or 8 in clothing and a medium should fit. I had to return it but will reorder a large maybe. The apricot color is actually cream. Quality looked to be good, soft and you could wear this with a dress or jeans. Very versatile. Read more
items.author: Kendrick

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty but pricey
items.body: This is very cute. Hoping it doesn't look frumpy. I am going to size down to a small from the medium. It's a little bulkier than I want. Very nice though. Little pricey imo though. Read more
items.author: TY FINN

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: This is the cutest and comfiest little shrug. The material was surprisingly softer than I expected and all the details make it look so pretty! It looks really good with a strapless dress and the length goes down to about the waist. Read more
items.author: Ahsvtw

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little shrug.
items.body: Not only does it fit well, but it is very soft. It’s lightweight yet heavy enough to keep your shoulders. Warm and hide your problem areas. Love this I definitely would recommend it. I ordered XXL because I did read that some people said it runs a little smaller and although I’m a one X this fits perfect not too tight. Read more
items.author: Debra Bakeman

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars nice products and worry free shopping.
items.body: Elegant and nice. I ordered one for each of my girls, and they both loved them. Quality is good, especially for the price. Best part, especially when it comes to buying clothes online, was when I had to return one because one of my girls is in between sizes wanted something a little smaller. The return was approved immediately and the credit was issued the same day I dropped it off at UPS. I will definitely buy from them again; nice products and worry free shopping. Read more
items.author: Beegood

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Runs very large
items.body: Pretty sweater and very soft, but runs very big. I have narrow shoulders but a large chest, so I often have to buy a large. This large was loose in the arms and around the chest, fit like an XXL. I may try another size and see how it goes. Read more
items.author: Christina Schoenfeld

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy it! Worth it!
items.body: Love it!!! 200 lbs 5’9” - height No wrinkles, 3/4 sleeves, size large, color tan/beige, no buttons. Fits great. I had issues of back side fleeing to open, as you see it does not. Love it. Keeping it for sure. Perfect for a ceremony event, super light material not meant for cold weather. Read more
items.author: Leigh

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black-008, 3/4 Sleeve-black, White-041, Black-035, Black-037, White-035, Apricot-041, White-037, 3/4 Sleeve-apricot, White-008, Apricot-035, Black-041, 3/4 Sleeve-white, Apricot-037. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
